intro: Streptocarpus dunnii, commonly known as the Dunns streptocarpus, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its attractive, tubular flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant typically grows as a perennial herb with fleshy, succulent leaves. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires bright, indirect light to flourish. Streptocarpus dunnii is popular among gardeners for its ornamental value and ease of cultivation.
